DOC.brief_summary: BACKGROUND : Between 3-4 % pregnancy carry term , fetuses breech presentation . The external version maneuver gynecological use turn breech cephalic presentation . For treatment pain suggest use μ agonist remifentanil fast action elimination . OBJECTIVE : To compare effectiveness remifentanil pain management external version . PATIENTS : Pregnant 36 week breech presentation meet inclusion criterion sign consent . Participants randomize two group procedure . Group intervention : paracetamol remifentanil Control group : paracetamol placebo DETERMINATIONS : VAS pain level , percentage success maneuver adverse event . Statistical Analysis : Comparison pain record VAS group comparison adverse event
DOC.brief_title: Remifentanil Versus Paracetamol Pain Treatment External Cephalic Versions .
DOC.criteria: Fetuses week 36 41 gestation confirm ultrasound noncephalic presentation . Informed consent sign mother legal representative absence . Fetal anomaly Severe hypertension Allergy drug use test Amniotic fluid index ≥ 5 cm Contraindication vaginal delivery Uterine abnormality impair coagulation Placenta previa Rh sensitization Multiple gestation Ruptured membrane Premature detachment normally insert placenta The mother great weight 85kg
